AI Description: Pychopper is a Python package designed for chopping neutron time-of-flight data that is commonly seen in neutron scattering experiments. It provides functionalities for processing, cleaning, analyzing, and visualizing neutron scattering data efficiently.
Core Features:
1. Chopping neutron time-of-flight data
2. Processing and cleaning raw data
3. Analyzing neutron scattering data
4. Visualizing data in various forms
